name: Caldwell - Sevillana - Magnum
additionalNotes: Robert Caldwell crafts his cigars with great attention to detail and you can tell by his blends that he has a great love of the leaf.  Robert Caldwell is rapidly making a name for himself as a master craftsman at the top of his game.The Sevillana is a mellow to medium- bodied cigar produced in the Dominican Republic with an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper and a mystery blend of binder and filler.  The cigar is balanced and smooth, with notes of sweet cream, pepper, wood, cedar, and sweet spice.  This is a flawlessly constructed cigar that is complex and tasty down to the nub.
